description: Leno Rodokin is the son of Garon and Pano`s brother, and the first enemy fought in the war games. He fought against Alviss, who easily beat him. He was killed by King (which left behind his mask) and revived at the end, watching Pano and Jack from afar with his father. A Nature Ã„RM user.
name: Leno Rodokin
